+ Wiki Fonts

++ Setting a font attribute for an individual page

You can change the font of a single WikiPage by adding a font attribute to that page. 

+++ Example

[font: Verdana]

This font attribute \[font: Verdana] is what changes the font of this page to Verdana.


++ Setting a global font attribute

You can change the default font for the entire wiki by creating a global attribute.

+++ Example

[global.font: Courier New]

\[global.font: Courier New] would set the default font for the wiki to "Courier New".  


See WikiDocumentAttributes for more information about attributes.
